name: Chocolate Sin Pie
author: Jennifer Mercer Stacey
summary: A household favorite dessert; the crust makes the difference!
ingredients: 1 cup frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
1 (5.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray
Stir flour, pecans, and butter together in a bowl; press into the bottom of the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until crust is golden and crisp, about 15 minutes
Stir cream cheese, 1 cup whipped topping, and confectioners' sugar together in a bowl until smooth; spread over cooled crust
Whisk milk and pudding together in a bowl until slightly thickened, about 2 minutes
Let sit until pudding is set, about 5 minutes
Spread pudding mixture over cream cheese layer
Top cream cheese layer with 12 ounces whipped topping
Refrigerate until flavors blend and pie is set, about 24 hours
